thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 22 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Steinhoff To Place 29.5 Mln Shares In PSG Group Via Accelerated Bookbuild

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Steinhoff To Place 29.5 Mln Shares In PSG Group Via Accelerated Bookbuild
text:
Jan 22 (Reuters) - Steinhoff International Holdings Nv :
* LAUNCH OF PLACING OF SHARES IN PSG GROUP LIMITED * STEINHOFF INTERNATIONAL - COMPANY HAS DECIDED TO LAUNCH AN ACCELERATED BOOKBUILD IN ORDER TO PLACE APPROXIMATELY 29.5 MILLION ORDINARY SHARES IN PSG GROUP
* ‍PLACING WILL COMMENCE WITH IMMEDIATE EFFECT AND COMPANY RESERVES RIGHT TO CLOSE IT AT ANY TIME​
* ‍PRICING AND ALLOCATIONS WILL BE ANNOUNCED AS SOON AS PRACTICABLE FOLLOWING CLOSING OF BOOK​
* PLACING IS TO BE CARRIED OUT BY PSG CAPITAL PROPRIETARY LIMITED AND STANDARD BANK OF SOUTH AFRICA LIMITED Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
